app.title: Prompt Tester
app.subtitle: Test and grade prompts across multiple LLMs

testEditor.title: Edit Test Case
testEditor.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this test case?

messages.selectModel: Please select at least one model before running the test

modelSelector.title: Select Models
modelSelector.subtitle: Choose one or more models to test your prompts against
modelSelector.noSelection: Please select at least one model to run tests

grading.title: Grade Result
grading.rubricHelper: Define the criteria for automatic grading
grading.autoInfo: The response will be sent to GPT-4 along with this rubric for evaluation.

export.title: Export Results

formats.excel: Excel (.xlsx) - Best for analysis and reporting

export.info: Excel export will create multiple sheets: Test Cases, Results, Grades, and a Summary sheet with all scores.
export.noData: No data to export. Please create and run some tests first.

roundTrip.label: Enable Round-Trip Translation
roundTrip.description: Translate prompts from Dutch to English, process, then translate back

selfHostedLLM.label: Use Self-Hosted LLM's
selfHostedLLM.description: Allows to configure a path to a llm-frog manager instance which handles local llm's store

activated.title: Configure path to llmfrog
activated.label: LLMFrog url path
activated.helper: Your llmfrog path for making requests

api.title: API Configuration
api.keyHelper: Your OpenRouter API key for accessing models
